name: Why MVC is so important
comment: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for the applicaiton logic.

name: Authentication vs.Authorization
comment: There is a difference between authenticaition and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own identity, whereas authorization means being allowed access to the system.
